name: @giraphql/schema-builder-root
description: A strongly typed code first schema builder for GraphQL

scripts.build: pnpm refs && pnpm run -r generate && beemo typescript --build --reference-workspaces && pnpm build-esm && pnpm create-config
scripts.build-esm: ESM_BUILD=true pnpm create-config && ESM_BUILD=true beemo typescript --build --reference-workspaces --transpile-only && pnpm build-esm:extensions
scripts.ci: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && pnpm run lint
scripts.prerelease: pnpm clean && pnpm install && pnpm run ci
scripts.release: pnpm run prerelease && changeset publish && git push --follow-tags && git status && pnpm -r publish
scripts.snapshot: pnpm prerelease && changeset version --snapshot preview && pnpm install && changeset publish --tag preview

author: Michael Hayes
